about_the_game:
Gather your party and return to Senenthia to investigate the sudden appearance of a mysterious portal. Enjoy an all-new story that can be played as Act 2 or 3 of your adventure. Enlist the help of two new dual-class heroes and discover what lies beneath the Sands of Ulminin.

The sudden emergence of a curious portal has led to wild rumors across the kingdom of Senenthia. Prepare your band of adventurers and make your way to the desert lands of Ulminin - home to ancient pyramids and vast canyons - to uncover the secrets that lie in wait.

  • Unravel the mysteries that lurk beneath the rolling sands of this mystical new zone.

  • Welcome two new heroes with powerful abilities to your party.

  • Over 20 new enemies and three new bosses to defeat.

  • Master two new Aura and Curse mechanics: Scourge and Zeal.

  • Add variety to your decks with 30 new items and three new pets to unlock.

New Heroes Answer the Call

  • Joining you on your adventure are two new heroes with powers previously unseen: Laia and Navalea.
  • Laia is a Paladin—a Warrior Healer hybrid—capable of dealing incredible damage and helping her party in times of need.
  • Navalea is a Fallen—a mix of Warrior and Mage—a masterful fighter, proficient in the ways of the mage.
  • Both heroes can utilize cards from their hybrid classes, unlocking powerful dual-class options for you to experiment with.

The Mysterious Land of Sand Awaits

  • Explore a multi-layered zone that can be played as either Act 2 or 3 of your adventure.
  • Discover the brand-new Scarab mechanic. Defeat the scarabs that randomly appear during combat and your party will be rewarded with game-changing bonuses.


Pack the sunscreen and begin your journey to the Sands of Ulminin for a new Across the Obelisk challenge!
detailed_description:
Update Notes

In multiplayer, only a single member of the group requires the DLC to access the Sands of Ulminin through the yellow portal for Act 2 or 3 and access the content, unlock pets, and characters.

Note: To use the new characters and pets in this DLC, ownership is still required.


About the Game

Gather your party and return to Senenthia to investigate the sudden appearance of a mysterious portal. Enjoy an all-new story that can be played as Act 2 or 3 of your adventure. Enlist the help of two new dual-class heroes and discover what lies beneath the Sands of Ulminin.

Pack the sunscreen and begin your journey to the Sands of Ulminin for a new Across the Obelisk challenge!
